patterns: How can I summarize a text
Where is the page to summarize
What is the options to summarize a text
How can I test the summarizer
I need to summ a text
responses: You can use the summarizer by clicking on the magnifier icon. You can use the summarizer from an URL, or from a text.

patterns: How can I use the text editor

responses: You can simply use the text editor by creating a new project (+ icon). You can add a title, lists, texts...
